(Ohh, yea, I'm not tired. Sorry about that. Forgot the other Characters, du=
mb, dumb, dimb.)

::CyberShark::

    He held Battera, she looked shaken up=
. Vulois hadn't awakened yet, or CyberShark hadn't noticed him.
    "Are yo=
u all right?" He asked Battera.

::Four Nightmares::

    The other two tha=
t weren't at the Ark went to the Ark, and all four started to work on the A=
rk.

::Cerberus::

    He started to secure the destroyed Destron base, bui=
lding small drones (Just a few, no weapons, workers) to carry equipment to =
the new location.
    In his travels around the base he had noticed a locke=
d door. Blasting the door down he looked inside. There were so many parts t=
o Transformers in here, he had to try something, but it would come later.
 =
   Then he looked for some scanner equipment but couldn't find much, he kne=
w there should have been more. There weren't to many scorch marks on the ot=
hers, so it wasn't destroyed.

::Dark Prime::

    Carrying his new Scanner=
 equipment that the Destrons had been kind enough to "lend" he returned to =
Nod. Setting up the equipment he activated it. He could see all the main ba=
ses, with his in the center. He looked at the Alliance base with anticipati=
on.

::Eclipse/Wolveritron::

    They watched the little bot play in the g=
rass, wondering if she was supposed to. Then they walked into the CF. Hopin=
g to find out what had happened in their absence.

::Zergling::

    He ran=
 into walls and stuff in his quarters.
